channel.title: How do I place NPCs in Moparscape?
channel.description:
You read the title... And I need help with the whold thing because when i downloaded it...It only came with the install...And then the moparscape game... :mad: :mad: :mad:
TY! :D :D :D :D

item.title: How do I place NPCs in Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Ok,type in ::npc and then,go to help>NPC ID’s>you can see the name of a NPC,then a number beside it.so,
::npc 3842 would spawn a sea troll.You can kill these,they dont come back unless you spawn em again.For the server to autospawn them,you gota code something in the autospawn. ( I dunno ).

How to spawn items.This is easy,type in ::pickup item ID here. In example,a santa hat would be 1050/1051.
So,::pickup 1050 1000 would give you 1000 noted santas.

How to get NPC/item ID’s.
OK,open moparscape,go to the toolbar above it,clcik help>NPC ID’s/item ID’s.Type in the name of the NPC/item you want to spawn/::pickup.Find the NPC,look at the number beside the NPC’s name and type it in.So,::npc 3842 would be a sea troll.::pickup 1050 1 would be a santa hat.

How to do multiplespawning/::pickuping.You can’t do spawning by more then 1 at a time.Spawning a different amount of the same item would be ::pickup 1050 10000.This would give you 10,000 noted santa hats.

For information on how to build a server,go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html
(it’s a link.)

PS:Thanks for making this question! I’m making a tutorial about this.Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I place NPCs in Moparscape?
